title: Пересуд
overview: Five prisoners are sent under escort to review their cases. One of them is a hardened recidivist and a murderer, the other is a disgraced oligarch, the third is a young car thief, the fourth committed a murder out of jealousy, the fifth is a woman-hunting maniac. The transport gets into an accident, and the convicts have to flee: a recidivist kills the head of the convoy, leaving the others no choice
